name: HeatStroke (JustSomeDude22)
description:
CONTROLS:

WASD - move camera

Scrollwheel - Zoom camera

Mouse - select, build, move blimps, and more

1234 = hotkeys for building

STORY:

5098th year after The Cataclysm.

Only you can build a safe haven for the remnants of humanity. Build your infrastructure and protect it from the sun's heat with your reflective blimps. Leave it on the sun for too long, and all will be ashes.

Produce the resources needed for the ultimate goal: Reflective dome protecting humanity for the uncertain future to come.

CREDITS:

Using TinyFire VFX by Twelve. Music by Tyler Cunningham
